Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

addLockedPools(uint256,uint256,address).details: Admin only - add new staking pool

addSupportYieldTokens(address,address).details: Admin only - add stake and future yield token pair

params.stakeToken: address of token used to stake, `address(0)` for ETH
params.yieldToken: address of fyETH or fyUSDB token

closePool(uint256).details: Admin only - close staking pools Closed pool will not accept new staking

getGeneratedYield(uint256,uint256).details: get amount of yield token generated by staking position

repayWithStakeToken(uint256,uint256).details: repay to unlock position prematurely by staking token the amount of token need to be repay will be: stakeInfo.yieldAmount - yieldGeneratedByStakePosition if repay using ETH, any spares amount will be returned to `msg.sender`

repayWithYieldToken(uint256,uint256).details: repay to unlock position prematurely by future yield token the amount of token need to be repay will be: stakeInfo.yieldAmount - yieldGeneratedByStakePosition

setPoolYield(uint256,uint256).details: Admin only - set pool yield APY

stake(uint256,uint256).details: stake token into an pool with `poolId`

stakeTimes(uint256,address).details: get number of staking times of an account in a pool

unstake(uint256,uint256).details: unstake postion when locked time is passed

claimNativeYield().notice: Admin claims native yield and send to treasury address

claimUSDBYield().notice: Admin claims native USDB yield and send to treasury address

setPoolYield(uint256,uint256).notice: do not change pool APY after user start staking in the pool

setTreasury(address).notice: set treasury address Treasury is the wallet used to receive all native yield

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: if staking ETH, amount of wei send to contract must be equal to `amount` param
